bio: Software engineer with approximately  {{years, number}} years working in software development. Proficiency with front-end and back-end technologies. Technology and science enthusiast. I am experienced with Web Application Architecture, Software Design Principles, and Software Design Patterns. Interested in object-oriented programming, design patterns, functional programming, domain-driven design, and microservices. I am a versatile person with wide-ranging skills, eager to learn, and ready to face new and tough challenges in or out of my country.
